resources.string: Order your BioArm. Custom details and requirements can be mentioned.
Go through the lucid installation process. The arm has a fix and clicks design, giving you flexibility to detach when required.
Initial training session makes you familiar with how the BioArm functions and gives the device just enough EEG data to be up and running.
Use the app so that the arm learns your individual habits, signal patterns, while also giving you the option to save presets.
Use the app to get in touch with the community. Share experiences, solve problems, contribute presets and participate in social activities.
